content: strand all the way through your last doubled up chain while holding the gill in place gently pull on both loose strands at the same time the end of the gill should tighten a bit do not tie an additional knot sew the gills on to the head using a needle to pull each loose yarn around one stitch but from opposite directions this will help the gill stand up straight tie and hide the yarn ends mouth loop some dark pink yarn around the center 3 stitches on the front of the face congratulations you are finished
